mapper.select: select building_rent_id, building_id, company_id, building_rent_start_time, building_rent_end_time, building_rent_price, pay_status from building_rent where building_rent_id = #{buildingRentId}
select building_rent_id, building_id, company_id, building_rent_start_time, building_rent_end_time, building_rent_price, pay_status from TESTKAPOK.building_rent
mapper.insert: insert into building_rent(building_id, company_id, building_rent_start_time, building_rent_end_time, building_rent_price, pay_status) values (#{buildingId}, #{companyId}, #{buildingRentStartTime}, #{buildingRentEndTime}, #{buildingRentPrice}, #{payStatus})

(#{entity.buildingId}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.buildingRentStartTime}, #{entity.buildingRentEndTime}, #{entity.buildingRentPrice}, #{entity.payStatus})

insert into building_rent(building_id, company_id, building_rent_start_time, building_rent_end_time, building_rent_price, pay_status) values
(#{entity.buildingId}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.buildingRentStartTime}, #{entity.buildingRentEndTime}, #{entity.buildingRentPrice}, #{entity.payStatus})
on duplicate key update building_id = values(building_id), company_id = values(company_id), building_rent_start_time = values(building_rent_start_time), building_rent_end_time = values(building_rent_end_time), building_rent_price = values(building_rent_price), pay_status = values(pay_status)

update building_rent
building_id = #{buildingId},
company_id = #{companyId},
building_rent_start_time = #{buildingRentStartTime},
building_rent_end_time = #{buildingRentEndTime},
building_rent_price = #{buildingRentPrice},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
where building_rent_id = #{buildingRentId}
